How much of Baldur's Gate 3 can you play in early access?

Larian says that the early access version of the game will contain about 20 hours of gameplay. About 80 combat encounters, 45,980 lines of dialogues, and 596 characters in BG3 EA.

What's the Level cap in Baldur's Gate 3?

In Baldur's Gate 3, your characters can reach a maximum level of 10, however, you can only reach level 4 in early access.
